module.name: Toolwin
module.short: Implements a control which can paint its client area with borders

element.name: TEdgeBorder
element.short: Enumeration with values that indicate the border edges to draw in TToolWindow

descr.p: TEdgeBorder is an enumeration type with values that indicate the border edges to draw in TToolWindow. Values in TEdgeBorder are stored in the TEdgeBorders set type.

element.name: TEdgeBorder.ebLeft
element.short: Draws the border on the left edge of the control

element.name: TEdgeBorder.ebTop
element.short: Draws the border on the top edge of the control

element.name: TEdgeBorder.ebRight
element.short: Draws the border on the right edge of the control

element.name: TEdgeBorder.ebBottom
element.short: Draws the border on the bottom edge of the control

element.name: TEdgeBorders
element.short: Set used to store TEdgeBorder enumeration values

descr.p: TEdgeBorders is a set type used to store values from the TEdgeBorder enumeration. TEdgeBorders is the type used for the TToolWindow.EdgeBorders property.

element.name: TEdgeStyle
element.short: Enumeration type with values that specify the drawing style for borders

descr.p: TEdgeStyle is an enumeration type with values that specify the drawing style for borders on a control. TEdgeStyle is the type used to implement the TToolWindow.EdgeInner and TToolWindow.EdgeOuter properties.

element.name: TEdgeStyle.esNone
element.short: No edge style is used

element.name: TEdgeStyle.esRaised
element.short: Edge is drawn with a raised appearance

element.name: TEdgeStyle.esLowered
element.short: Edge is drawn with a lowered or sunken appearance

element.name: TToolWindow
element.short: Implements a control which can paint its client area with borders

descr.p: TToolWindow is a TCustomControl which supports sizing and drawing its client area with borders. TToolWindow contains properties used to specify the borders (inner and outer) for the control. Methods are provided which adjust the client rectangle for the control, and paint the control to its canvas handle with the desired border edges and style.
TToolWindow is the ancestor for TToolBar and TCoolBar.

element.name: TToolWindow.SetEdgeBorders
element.short: Sets the value in the EdgeBorders property

element.name: TToolWindow.SetEdgeBorders.Value
element.short: New value for the property

element.name: TToolWindow.SetEdgeInner
element.short: Sets the value for the EdgeInner property

element.name: TToolWindow.SetEdgeInner.Value
element.short: New value for the property

element.name: TToolWindow.SetEdgeOuter
element.short: Sets the value in the EdgeOuter property

element.name: TToolWindow.SetEdgeOuter.Value
element.short: New value for the property

element.name: TToolWindow.FUpdateCount
element.short: Internal counter used in BeginUpdate and EndUpdate

element.name: TToolWindow.AdjustClientRect
element.short: Adjusts the client rectangle when borders are drawn for the control

descr.p: AdjustClientRect is a procedure used to adjust the specified client rectangle when borders are drawn for the control. AdjustClientRect ensures that the client rectangle is increased in size according to values in EdgeBorders and the drawing styles in EdgeOuter and EdgeInner.

element.name: TToolWindow.AdjustClientRect.ARect
element.short: Client rectangle for the control

element.name: TToolWindow.Paint
element.short: Draws the control with the borders and style needed

descr.p: Paint is an overridden procedure that draws the control with the borders and styles indicated in EdgeBorders, EdgeInner, and EdgeOuter. Paint calls DrawEdge to render the control, and calls the inherited Paint method.

element.name: TToolWindow.Create
element.short: Constructor for the class instance

descr.p: Create is the constructor for the class instance, and calls the inherited constructor using TheOwner as the owner of the control. Create sets the default values for the following properties:

dl.dd: Set to the value [ebLeft, ebTop, ebRight, ebBottom]

element.name: TToolWindow.Create.TheOwner
element.short: Owner of the class instance

element.name: TToolWindow.BeginUpdate
element.short: Increments the internal counter for buffering calls to Update

element.name: TToolWindow.EndUpdate
element.short: Decrements the internal counter for buffering calls to Update

element.name: TToolWindow.EdgeBorders
element.short: Indicates the edges to be drawn with a border on the control

descr.p: EdgeBorders is a TEdgeBorders property that indicates the edges to be drawn with a border on the control. The default value for EdgeBorders is [ebLeft, ebTop, ebRight, ebBottom]. EdgeBorders is used in the Paint method to render the control with borders in the specified positions with the drawing style in EdgeInner and EdgeOuter.

element.name: TToolWindow.EdgeInner
element.short: Specifies the drawing style used for the inner border of the control

descr.p: EdgeInner is a TEdgeStyle property that specifies the drawing style used for the inner border of the control. The default value for the property is esRaised.
EdgeInner is used, along with EdgeOuter, to give the control a beveled 3D appearance. Use EdgeOuter to control the drawing style for the outer border on the control.
Use EdgeBorders to specify the positions (for both inner and outer) where borders are drawn.

element.name: TToolWindow.EdgeOuter
element.short: Specifies the drawing style used for the outer border of the control

descr.p: EdgeOuter is a TEdgeStyle property that specifies the drawing style used for the outer border of the control. The default value for the property is esLowered.
EdgeOuter is used, along with EdgeInner, to give the control a beveled 3D appearance. Use EdgeInner to control the drawing style for the inner border on the control.
Use EdgeBorders to specify the positions (for both inner and outer) where borders are drawn.
